abstract: Peter Isaacson discusses his time as Chairman of the Shrine of Remembrance Trustees and the role the Shrine has in helping Australians remember.
description: After returning from World War II, having served in the RAAF as a Pathfinder, Peter Isaacson was appointed a Shrine of Remembrance Trustee. He discusses his time at the Shrine, as Chairman of the Shrine of Remembrance Trustees and the role of the Shrine in helping Australians remember as well as teaching those who don't remember the history of Australia at war.
